# Social Engineering Prevention

Learn how to build, monitor, and respond with Social Engineering Prevention in Android & iOS apps using Appdome’s AI-native dynamic defense plug-ins. Automate the build, test, release, and monitor lifecycle of Social Engineering Prevention defenses with 400+ mobile app protections including anti-vishing, remote desktop scam prevention and defenses against screensharing scams and malware.
Deliver Certified Secure™ protections without SDKs, agents, or servers in your CI/CD pipeline. Continuously protect users, track defenses across the app lifecycle, and transform social engineering attacks into seamless, on-brand user experiences with rapid response and zero-day defense. If you need further assistance, use the search field or contact [support.appdome.com](https://support.appdome.com/).
